actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from xgboost import XGBClassifier

# 1. Load data
train_path = 'data/train.csv'
test_path = 'data/test.csv'
train_df = pd.read_csv(train_path)
test_df = pd.read_csv(test_path)

# 2. Combine for consistent preprocessing
test_df['Survived'] = np.nan
combined = pd.concat([train_df, test_df], sort=False)

# 3. Feature engineering
# 3.1 Title extraction from Name
combined['Title'] = combined['Name'].str.extract(r',\s*([^\.]*)\s*\.', expand=False)
# Group rare titles
title_map = {
    'Mlle': 'Miss', 'Ms': 'Miss', 'Mme': 'Mrs', 'Lady': 'Royal', 'Countess': 'Royal',
    'Dona': 'Royal', 'Dr': 'Officer', 'Rev': 'Officer', 'Col': 'Officer', 'Major': 'Officer',
    'Jonkheer': 'Royal', 'Capt': 'Officer', 'Sir': 'Royal', 'Don': 'Royal'
}
combined['Title'] = combined['Title'].replace(title_map)
rare_titles = combined['Title'].value_counts()[combined['Title'].value_counts() < 10].index
combined['Title'] = combined['Title'].replace(rare_titles, 'Rare')

# 3.2 Family size and alone flag
combined['FamilySize'] = combined['SibSp'] + combined['Parch'] + 1
combined['IsAlone'] = (combined['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3.3 Cabin letter
combined['CabinLetter'] = combined['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown').apply(lambda x: x[0] if x != 'Unknown' else 'U')

# 3.4 Ticket prefix
def ticket_prefix(ticket):
    ticket = ticket.replace('.', '').replace('/', '').split()
    return ticket[0] if not ticket[0].isdigit() else 'NUM'
combined['TicketPrefix'] = combined['Ticket'].apply(ticket_prefix)

# 3.5 Fare per person
combined['FarePP'] = combined['Fare'] / combined['FamilySize']

# 3.6 Age bins to capture nonlinearity (but keep continuous age too)
combined['AgeBin'] = pd.cut(combined['Age'], bins=[0,12,20,35,60,80], labels=False)

# 4. Handle missing values
# Age: median per Title
combined['Age'] = combined.groupby('Title')['Age'].transform(lambda x: x.fillna(x.median()))
combined['Age'].fillna(combined['Age'].median(),
